key_features: 3.33% cashback on all local and foreign spend, up to S$200 per quarter
3.33% cashback on insurance payment (only 50% of each tier considered)
Complimentary Travel Insurance coverage up to S$500,000
petrol: Up to 23.38% fuel saving when you link your Diamond Sky Fuel Card to your Platinum Visa Card
cash_back: Up to 3.33% cashback on all local and foreign spend
Get up to S$30 Cashback per quarter when you spend a min. of S$300 in eligible transactions per month
Get up to S$100 Cashback per quarter when you spend a min. of S$1,000 in eligible transactions per month
Get up to S$200 Cashback per quarter when you spend a min. of S$2,000 in eligible transactions per month
entertainment: Up to 3.33% cashback on all local and foreign spend with a min. spend of S$300/month OR S$1000/month each quarter for S$30 OR S$100 cashback
dining: Up to 3.33% cashback on all local and foreign spend
shopping: Up to 3.33% cashback on all local and foreign spend

fees.annual_fee_waiver: Subsequent annual fee will be automatically waived with a minimum spend of S$18,000 yearly
fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.90% p.a. subject to a minimum charge of S$3.00
fees.late_payment_fee: 5% of the minimum monthly repayment or S$100, whichever is higher, if minimum monthly repayment is not received by due date
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 3% of outstanding balance or S$20, whichever is higher
fees.foreign_transaction_fee: All transactions in foreign currency will be subject to an administrative fee of 2.25% and a currency conversion charge of 1% imposed by the respective card associations
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the transaction amount or S$15, whichever is higher
